title: ZWCAD.ZW3D.v2015.X64-AMPED
description:
ZWCAD+ is the next milestone of the well-received ZWCAD, a proven CAD
solution with 320,000+ customers throughout the world. It leverages the
power of its new and superior kernel and provides a fluid and efficient
design experience.
ZWCAD+ ensures even greater .dwg support, better memory control, and
code-level API compatibility, making it an all-encompassing solution
for users in the AEC and MCAD industries.

NOTE: This new version has improved stability, increased ease of use
and advanced localization, which gives users a more fluid experience.
With these updates, designers will be able to better take advantage of
the new and superior kernel and complete their work faster and more
efficiently.

Read and write .dwg files more accurately
The already excellent .dwg support on ZWCAD 2012 now gets even better
on ZWCAD+. Having been through over 50,000 extremely rigorous drawing
tests to guarantee seamless .dwg compatibility, ZWCAD+ makes
cross-platform communication easier than ever before.

Take on tougher design tasks more easily
The new memory optimization technology enables ZWCAD+ to open any
drawing with memory usage reduced by 50%. That's why it works smoothly
with  drawings that are even over 100 MB. It's also excellent in
reducing  memory accumulation, which ensures non-stop operation
throughout the day.

Port application more efficiently
ZRX and ARX are now code-level compatible. Lisp routines can now run
directly on ZWCAD+ with only a few modifications. The new APIs enable
developers to port their applications to ZWCAD+ ten times faster. The
ported applications run up to 8 times faster when compared with ZWCAD.

Interact with a new Ribbon UI more fluidly
The ribbon interface of ZWCAD+ might just be the cleanest ribbon UI
ever. Its ribbon panel is designed to have JUST-ENOUGH buttons that all
show on the panel, which brings simplicity to the whole interface and
helps increase your productivity.

New and Enhanced Features Boost Your Design Efficiency
More frequently used functions have been added to ZWCAD+, including
Associative Dimension, Block Attribute Manager, Field (Object),
Viewport Maximization, and Cycle Select. Fundamental enhancements, such
as Tool Palettes, Revision Cloud, Snap, Match Properties, and Batch
Processing on Layouts, have also been made to take your design
efficiency to the next level.


HOW TO INSTALL/RUN THIS RELEASE
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
1 - Unpack the release into a directory of your choice.
2 - Run the installer and install it.
3 - Copy the files from /crack into the installation directory.
4 - Have a go with this unlimited trial, but buy it if you will use it.
5 - As always, make sure to have a firewall to block outbound
connections
